Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Feedback from GenAI is instant and I can ask it to pinpoint places in my work where something is 'wrong' or needs to be fixed. Teacher feedback is also very helpful however it can be less specific (due to time constraints they can't be as specific).

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher feedback can pick up more issues to do with the overall idea or theme whereas GenAI is more to do with writing style and grammatical errors.
